code: import React from'react';import CompanyCard from'./CompanyCard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CompanyGrid=_ref=>{let{companies,onClickCompany}=_ref;if(!companies||companies.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-400 text-center",children:"No companies available."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",children:companies.map(company=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompanyCard,{company:company,onClickCompany:onClickCompany},company._id))});};export default CompanyGrid;
